name: Rahul S
tagline: AR/VR Developer • Video Editor • Game Designer
about: Hello! I'm a passionate and versatile creator specializing in AR/VR development, video editing, and game design. With a strong foundation in Unity, I build immersive, interactive experiences that blend storytelling with technology. I also work on crafting engaging visuals through graphic design and motion-driven content. Whether it's developing gamified applications, editing cinematic videos, or bringing virtual worlds to life, I love creating meaningful digital experiences that connect and inspire. I'm always exploring new tools and ideas to push creative and technical boundaries.
